dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, seven thousand violations? Since the beginning of the year? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, seven thousand violations? Since the beginning of the year? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: С начала года зарегистрировано более 7 тысяч подобных нарушений.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I know, it's, uh, pretty wild, right? Like, Almaty has a real problem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I know, it's, uh, pretty wild, right? Like, Almaty has a real problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, a "problem." Don't they always? It's just cars, emissions, whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, a problem. Don't they always? It's just cars, emissions, whatever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but this is, like, a new level. They even have, what, nineteen stationary checkpoints now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but this is, like, a new level. They even have, what, nineteen stationary checkpoints now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В городе функционируют 19 стационарных экопостов, где проверяется уровень выбросов.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. More checkpoints. That'll fix it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. More checkpoints. That'll fix it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen, a deputy, um, Sergey Ponomarev, he called it an ecological disaster. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, listen, a deputy, um, Sergey Ponomarev, he called it an ecological disaster. That's not nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ранее депутат мажилиса Сергей Пономарев призывал принять срочные меры для решения экологических проблем Алматы, назвав ситуацию экологической катастрофой.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Ecological disaster." Hyperbole much? They always say that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ecological disaster. Hyperbole much? They always say that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the fines are, like, real now. Not just a warning. Thirty-nine thousand tenge. That's, uh, not pocket change for a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the fines are, like, real now. Not just a warning. Thirty-nine thousand tenge. That's, uh, not pocket change for a lot of people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: …водителям, превысившим допустимые нормы выбросов, теперь грозит не только предупреждение, но и штраф в размере 10 МРП (39 320 тенге).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So now people just pay up and keep polluting. Great system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So now people just pay up and keep polluting. Great system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, um, it's about the sheer volume. They said, like, every sixth car fails inspection. Every sixth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, um, it's about the sheer volume. They said, like, every sixth car fails inspection. Every sixth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Читайте также: Каждый шестой автомобиль не проходит экотест в Алматы

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, you know, just more dirty air. What else is new?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, you know, just more dirty air. What else is new?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's our air, though. It, um, affects everyone. It matters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's our air, though. It, um, affects everyone. It matters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Does it, though? Feels like, you know, just another Tuesday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Does it, though? Feels like, you know, just another Tuesday.
